mapper.select: select * from hf_game_issue where issueStatus = 1 and lotteryId = #{lotteryId}
select numberRecord, issueCode from hf_game_issue where issueStatus > 2 and lotteryId = #{lotteryId} ORDER BY issueCode desc limit 2000

SELECT t1.id, t1.orderCode, t1.lotteryId, t1.issueCode, t1.totalAmount, t1.numberRecord, t1.gamePlanId, t1.saleTime, t1.calculateWinTime, t1.orderStatus, t1.accWin , (select CONCAT(numberRecord, '=', sumRecord) from hf_game_issue where t1.issueCode = issueCode) issueResult from hf_game_order t1 where t1.id = #{id} and t1.userId = #{userId}

select left (t.saleTime, 10) analDate, (sum (t.accWin)- sum (t.totalAmount)) as analAomout from hf_game_order t where t.orderStatus >1 and t.userId=#{userId} and t.lotteryId= #{lotteryId} group by left (t.saleTime, 10) order by left (t.saleTime, 10) desc limit 30
